title: Specify the font movie
content:
Hi all!

Just want to apologize for my bad English.

People, help please learn to find, identify what kind of font file attached.

Need just such as in the picture.

For earlier grateful.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725190102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5039.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725190102/http:/typophile.com/files/font_12.JPG) | 30.24 KB |
author: Dealaxer

comments.content: A manually slanted FF [QType](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725190102/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-qtype) should match.
It's great what you need! Thank you so much!
